pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Acacia Ent Tree.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)N/A$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 18-24 $(item)Acacia Logs$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Acacia Leaves$() or 1-4 $(item)Acacia Saplings$(), 0-2 $(item)Grass$(), 85%% chance of 1-2 $(item)Diamonds$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: An ancient like creature of leaves, wood, and saplings, The Acacia Ent is a massive creature that stands taller than most mobs in the world, as well as bulkier and stronger than most. Acacia Ents are one of the less angry ents. What could this mean about the Savanna?
